thread.title: Paul Walker's Daughter Meadow Shares Big Relationship Update
thread.title_full: Paul Walker's Daughter Meadow Shares Big Relationship Update

author: Devon Forward
title: Paul Walker's Daughter Meadow Shares Big Relationship Update
text:
Paul Walker's Daughter Meadow Shares Big Relationship Update
At the end of 2023, Meadow Walker, the 25-year-old daughter of the late Fast & Furious actor
Paul Walker, made a big announcement regarding her marriage.
Just over two years after she got married to Louis Thornton-Allan in October 2021, Meadow announced that the two were splitting up in a joint statement with Thornton-Allan on Instagram.
On Wednesday, Dec. 27, the model shared a photo on social media of the "statement from the two of us," which read, ‚ÄúAfter three wonderful years of marriage, we have come to the agreement to amicably separate. This is truly a united decision and we sincerely hope that everyone can respect our wishes for privacy.‚Äù
‚ÄúWe maintain mutual love and respect for one another, and will continue to support each other," the message concluded.
Many people shared words of support for Meadow in the comments, with friends "sending love" to the 25-year-old. A fan wrote, "Nothing but love and respect for you!!‚ù§Ô∏è You are amazing, love you!üèª."
Meadow and Thornton-Allan tied the knot in late 2021 in the Dominican Republic, sharing
a clip from the wedding on Instagram with the excited message, "we‚Äôre married !!!!"
The ceremony was attended by Meadow's godfather and her father Paul's co-star and close friend, Vin Diesel, while another Fast & Furious star Jordana Brewster, who played Paul's love interest Mia, was reportedly also in attendance.
Meadow also marked the couple's one-year anniversary last fall with a sweet snap of the two embracing, writing, "Happy anniversary my love! One year married to you ."
Earlier this year, Meadow celebrated her father in a very special way by making a
small cameo in the latest Fast & Furious film, Fast X. She appeared at the film's premiere in Rome, looking stunning in a stylish ensemble as she posed with Diesel.
